ModMetaData.name: [1.1] Potions
ModMetaData.author: FantasyFan
ModMetaData.description:
Have you ever wanted to be a witch and brew many potions. Now you can.
This mod adds eleven different potions: -Potion of saturation (like a meal) -Potion of life (like resurrector mech serum) -Healing potion (like healer mech serum) -Potion of knowledge (like techprof subpersona core) -Potion of skills (like neurotrainer mech serum) -Luziferium potion (like Luziferium) -Potion of stats (temporary stat boost - like move speed/sight/...) -Drug potion (something like the core drugs/alcohol) -Potion of Immunization (like penoxycyline) -Mental break potion (drinking will lead to mental break) -Antiradiation potion
One new workbench: -Cauldron (uses wood as fuel, workbench to brew potions)
Eleven research projects
One new plant: -Magic flower (Wind Daisy - turn bloom into magical dust)
Can be safely added to existing saves.
If you find things unbalanced, please make suggestions for improvement.
